permissions.name: ohos.permission.MANAGE_HAP_TOKENID
permissions.description: Invoke AccessToken::AccessTokenKit::AllocHapToken interface should have own this permission.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.PERMISSION_USED_STATS
permissions.description: Invoke AccessToken::PrivacyKit::AddPermissionUsedRecord interface should have own this permission.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.MANAGE_AUDIO_CONFIG
permissions.description: permission required for telephony to set microphone mute.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG
permissions.description: permission required for telephony to write call log.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.READ_CONTACTS
permissions.description: permission required for telephony to read contacts info.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.START_ABILITIES_FROM_BACKGROUND
permissions.description: Permission required for telephony to access AbillityManagerService.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.START_SYSTEM_DIALOG
permissions.description: permission required for telephony to start system dialog.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS
permissions.description: permission required for telephony to set audio mode.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.GRANT_SENSITIVE_PERMISSIONS
permissions.description: Permission required for BMS to grant sensitive permissions.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.REVOKE_SENSITIVE_PERMISSIONS
permissions.description: Permission required for BMS to revoke sensitive permissions.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.STORAGE_MANAGER
permissions.description: Permission required for UPMS to create or delete files shared between applications.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.PROXY_AUTHORIZATION_URI
permissions.description: Permission required for Grant Uri permission between applications.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.ABILITY_BACKGROUND_COMMUNICATION
permissions.description: Permission required for FMS to communicate in the background.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.MANAGE_LOCAL_ACCOUNTS
permissions.description: Permission required for FMS to manage local accounts.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.LISTEN_BUNDLE_CHANGE
permissions.description: Permission required for FMS to listen bundle change.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.INSTALL_SANDBOX_BUNDLE
permissions.description: Permission required for FMS to install sandbox bundle.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.GET_TELEPHONY_STATE
permissions.description: Permission required for telephony to get lock state of sim card.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.CONNECT_CELLULAR_CALL_SERVICE
permissions.description: Permission required for telephony to connect cellular call service.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.SEND_MESSAGES
permissions.description: Permission required for telephony to send reject call sms.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.SET_TELEPHONY_STATE
permissions.description: Permission required for telephony to update call state.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.VIBRATE
permissions.description: Permission required for telephony to vibrate.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.UPDATE_CONFIGURATION
permissions.description: Permission required for APPMS to update configuration when pointer device status change.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.REPORT_RESOURCE_SCHEDULE_EVENT
permissions.description: Permission required for AMS to report resource schedule event to RSS.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.START_INVISIBLE_ABILITY
permissions.description: Permission required for AMS to start LAUNCHER.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.GET_BUNDLE_INFO
permissions.description: Permission required for ReminderRequest to update the database.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.GET_SUSPEND_STATE
permissions.description: Permission required for AMS to register suspend state observer.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.PUBLISH_SYSTEM_COMMON_EVENT
permissions.description: Permission required for ScreenLock to publish a common event.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.GET_BUNDLE_INFO_PRIVILEGED
permissions.description: Permission required for BMS to get bundle info privileged.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.CLEAN_APPLICATION_DATA
permissions.description: Permission required for BMS to clean application data.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.REMOVE_CACHE_FILES
permissions.description: Permission required for BMS to remove cache files.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.USE_BLUETOOTH
permissions.description: Permission required for telephony to use bluetooth.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.CONNECTIVITY_INTERNAL
permissions.description: Permission required for connectivity to netconnectmgr.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.GET_RUNNING_INFO
permissions.description: Permission required for BMS to get running info.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_LOCAL_ACCOUNTS
permissions.description: Permission required for foundation to interact across local accounts.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.RUNNING_STATE_OBSERVER
permissions.description: Permission required for AMS to register application state observer.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.GET_INSTALLED_BUNDLE_LIST
permissions.description: Permission required for ERMS to query installed bundle list.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_LOCAL_ACCOUNTS_EXTENSION
permissions.description: Permission required for ERMS to register account observer.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.MANAGE_USER_ACCOUNT_INFO
permissions.description: Permission required for ERMS to query huawei id state.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.GET_NETWORK_INFO
permissions.description: Permission required for telephony to get network info.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.MANAGE_BLUETOOTH
permissions.description: Native uses the Bluetooth interface

permissions.name: ohos.permission.REQUIRE_FORM
permissions.description: Permission required for FMS to access theme manager service.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.ACCESS_SPAMSHIELD_SERVICE
permissions.description: Permission required for telephony to access spamshield service.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.APPROXIMATELY_LOCATION
permissions.description: Permission required for location earthquake alarm.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.LOCATION
permissions.description: Permission required for location earthquake alarm.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.LOCATION_IN_BACKGROUND
permissions.description: Permission required for location earthquake alarm.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.CAPTURE_SCREEN
permissions.description: Permission required for DMS to access render service TakeSurfaceCapture.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.MANAGE_MISSIONS
permissions.description: Permission required for ams to move scene_board to foreground or background.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.CONNECT_FORM_EXTENSION
permissions.description: Permission required for FMS to connect form extension.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.CONNECT_STATIC_SUBSCRIBER_EXTENSION
permissions.description: Permission required for CES to connect static subscriber extension.

permissions.name: ohos.permission.ACCESS_USER_AUTH_INTERNAL
permissions.description: Permission required for ScreenLock to observer user auth state.

restart.name: unset_bootevent bootevent.appfwk.ready
restart.description: before restart foundation process, unset bootevent.appfwk.ready

restart.name: unset_bootevent bootevent.lockscreen.ready
restart.description: before restart foundation process, unset bootevent.lockscreen.ready

restart.name: reset appspawn
restart.description: AMS requires all application to restart

restart.name: reset bgtaskmgr_service
restart.description: bgtaskmgr_service rely on AMS, need to restart

restart.name: reset inputmethod_service
restart.description: inputmethod_service rely on WMS, need to restart

restart.name: reset resource_schedule_service
restart.description: resource_schedule_service rely on AMS, need to restart

restart.name: reset device_usage_stats_service
restart.description: device_usage_stats_service rely on AMS, need to restart
